sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function EditObituary () { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect( () => { axios.get( 'http://localhost:8081/read/' + id ) .then( res => { console.log( res ) setValues( { ...values, fname: res.data[ 0 ].fName, lname: res.data[ 0 ].lName, dob: res.data[ 0 ].dob, dod: res.data[ 0 ].dod, country: res.data[ 0 ].country, city: res.data[ 0 ].city, religion: res.data[ 0 ].religion, title: res.data[ 0 ].title, donation: res.data[ 0 ].donation, description: res.data[ 0 ].description, name: res.data[ 0 ].userName, email: res.data[ 0 ].userEmail, contactNo: res.data[ 0 ].contactNo, nic: res.data[ 0 ].nic } ) } ) .catch( err => console.log( err ) ); }, [ id, values ] ); const [ values, setValues ] = useState( { fname: '', lname: '', dob: '', dod: '', country: '', city: '', religion: '', images: '', certificates: '', title: '', donation: '', description: '', name: '', email: '', contactNo: '', nic: '' } ); const handleEdit = ( event ) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.put( 'http://localhost:8081/edit/' + id, values ) .then( res => { console.log( res ) navigate( '/' ) } ) .catch( err => console.log( err ) ); } return (

EDIT YOUR OBITUARY ....

{/* for personal information */ }

Person's Information

setValues( { ...values, fname: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.fname } required />
setValues( { ...values, lname: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.lname } required />
setValues( { ...values, dob: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.dob } required />
setValues( { ...values, dod: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.dod } required />
setValues( { ...values, country: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.country } required />
setValues( { ...values, city: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.city } required />
setValues( { ...values, images: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.images } />
setValues( { ...values, certificates: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.certificates } />
{/* for more information */ }

More Information

setValues( { ...values, title: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.title } required />
{/* for user information */ }

Your Contact Details

setValues( { ...values, name: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.name } required />
setValues( { ...values, email: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.email } required />
setValues( { ...values, contactNo: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.contactNo } required />
setValues( { ...values, nic: e.target.value } ) } value={ values.nic } required />
Save
) } export default EditObituary
